name: Bullet
description: Move an object ahead at its current angle.  Typically used for bullets and projectiles.

conditions.name: Compare speed
conditions.description: Compare the current speed of the object.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Choose the way to compare the current speed.

params.name: Speed
params.description: The speed, in pixels per second, to compare the current speed to.

conditions.name: Compare distance travelled
conditions.description: Compare the distance the object has travelled.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: Choose the way to compare the distance travelled.

params.name: Distance
params.description: The distance, in pixels, to compare to.

conditions.name: On step
conditions.description: If stepping is enabled, triggers on each step for additional collision tests.

conditions.name: Is enabled
conditions.description: Test if the behavior is enabled.

params.name: Speed
params.description: The new speed of the object to set, in pixels per second.

params.name: Acceleration
params.description: The new acceleration of the object to set, in pixels per second per second.

actions.name: Set gravity
actions.description: Set the object's force of gravity.

params.name: Gravity
params.description: The new acceleration caused by gravity, in pixels per second per second.

actions.name: Set angle of motion
actions.description: Set the angle the object is moving at.
actions.display_text: Set {my} angle of motion to [i]{0}[/i] degrees

params.name: Angle
params.description: The new angle of motion, in degrees.

actions.name: Bounce off object
actions.description: Bounce the object off an object it is currently touching.

actions.name: Set enabled
actions.description: Set whether this behavior is enabled.

params.name: State
params.description: Set whether to enable or disable the behavior.

actions.name: Set distance travelled
actions.description: Change the counter used to track the distance travelled.

params.name: Distance
params.description: The new distance in pixels to set for the DistanceTravelled expression.

actions.name: Stop stepping
actions.description: Stop the stepping for this tick.

actions.name: Set bounce off solids
actions.description: Set whether the 'Bounce off solids' property is enabled.

params.name: Bounce off solids
params.description: Set whether to enable or disable bouncing off solids.

expressions.name: Speed
expressions.description: The current object speed, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: Acceleration
expressions.description: The acceleration setting, in pixels per second per second.

expressions.name: AngleOfMotion
expressions.description: The angle the object is currently moving at, in degrees.

expressions.name: DistanceTravelled
expressions.description: The distance, in pixels, the object has travelled so far.

expressions.name: Gravity
expressions.description: The current gravity in pixels per second per second.
